GERMANY 100Mbps LINUX VPS
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
InetWebHost Linux VPS runs on Open VZ technology which is controlled by SolusVM Panel gives the Linux VPS Servers to perform at a high standards with more reliability and scalability. Germany Linux VPS Plans are on Shared 100Mbps Network.

Germany Linux VPS - Main Hardware Nodes are located at "Telehouse" located in Frankfurt, Germany, Store Data Data Center, connected with 100Mbps Network.
